Control_Name: Employ least privilege, including for privileged accounts
Evidence_Source: IAM roles; custom roles; policy analyzer

Control_Name: Use non-privileged accounts for non-security functions
Manual_Evidence: Admin break-glass policy; PAW usage policy
Evidence_Source: Service accounts; IAM policy bindings; role usage logs

Control_Name: Use session lock with pattern-hiding displays
Manual_Evidence: Workstation baseline; MDM policies; Chrome policies
DevOps SOP; build approvals; IaC PR reviews
Session management policy; Chrome idle timeout
BYOD/External Systems Policy; vendor access approvals

Control_Name: Control use of portable storage devices
Manual_Evidence: Removable media policy; DLP policy; MDM restrictions
Evidence_Source: Endpoint MDM; DLP logs; Drive sharing settings

Control_Name: Limit use of portable storage devices on external systems
Manual_Evidence: Vendor device access SOP; VDI usage policy
Evidence_Source: VDI configs; DLP settings; IdP device trust
